About me

Who Am I

Hello! My name is Yurii. I am interested in the IT-industry, namely, I am developing in the field of manual and automated testing (QA/AQA). Successfully completed several courses on Manual QA, web development, worked with teachers, mentors. He studied at the IT-school ProgKiev.ua on the "QA-Start" course and on the educational online platform Udemy - there are specialized certificates. While studying at the GoIt IT-school on the courses: Front-End and Manual QA Engineer, he participated in the development of web projects, and was also the Team Lead of the intern-QA and intern-mobile-QA groups for testing a real project - an online store: "BigMag". Developed teamwork skills in Scrum. I have some experience with crowdfunding platforms: uTest and Test.io. At the moment I'm doing more web/mobile and desktop testingI am engaged in self-development, improving my skills in courses, trainings. I would be happy to consider various options for remote cooperation in this area (both long term and short term) full time or part time.

Сайт був створенний у 2009 році для для Централізованої Бібліотечної Системи Голосіївського р-ну при потребі міської Адміністрації для інформування місцян про новини роботи системи.

2009

CLS Golosivsky district

Category: Layout

Technologies used: HTML + CSS

The site was created in 2009 for the centralized library system of Holosiivskyi district when the city administration needs to inform the locals about the news of the district and the work of the system's libraries. The site was created in 2009 for the centralized library system of Holosiivskyi district when the city administration needs to inform the locals about the news of the district and the work of the system's libraries.

"QA-Start"

QA | 2021

QA - quality assurance. Tester - a specialist who takes part in testing a component or system. His duty is to search for possible errors and failures in the functioning of the program. the tester imulates various situations that may arise during the use of the test item so that developers can correct the detected errors.
